name: cloc-vsts-extension
description: cloc Visual Studio Team System (VTST) extension

scripts.setup: npm install && cd tasks/cloc-build-task && npm install
scripts.build: npm run setup && npm run build-without-setup
scripts.release: npm run build && node updateVersion.js && node node_modules/tfx-cli/_build/tfx-cli.js extension create --manifest-glob vss-extension.json --output-path ./dist
scripts.test-reporter: cd tasks/cloc-build-task && mocha tests/suite.js --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test-results.xml
scripts.test: npm run build-without-setup && cd tasks/cloc-build-task && mocha tests/suite.js

author: Dealogic
